text: We stayed here with my friend to expect singing for fun, we bought beers that are super expensive and waited 1h30 with no possibility to sing because many songs were registered before. Some people arrived 1h after us and had their songs coming up before ours because their table number was before our number. What a waste of time and money.
Good mic for karaoke singer. Pool table. Friendly staffs and nice place to know more friends. Price is cheaper than other pub. Every Tuesday got lucky draw.

It's a very atmospheric place that very impressive. Just listening to the songs brings back many memories. The staff and guests are like old friends, and many of them can sing very well, very surprising.
Interesting place to chill,small pub don’t expect much , but for beers and sing Ktv along china town it’s ok

Had a top 5 night of my life here doing karaoke with friends. This is a dive bar where the regulars (or so they seemed to me) have incredible singing voices. It's like something out of a movie, and a nice antidote to the slickness you find elsewhere in Singapore. I would give it 10 stars if I could.
